application.name: IPTWeather
application.description:
IPTWeather brings weather to iPhoneToday and/or S2U2.
Download and support at http://iptweather.googlecode.com
Please make a backup of your weather.ini file before installing the cab!
What's new in IPTWeather_20100423:
- Automatically disable iPhoneToday's IPTWeather icon updates if it is not used.
- Bypass an issue of iPhoneToday in version 1.5.2, that do not reset the registry value reloadIcons on start.
